TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DiscoveryEndpointProvider extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Fornece um ponto de extremidade de descoberta.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> classe usa classes derivadas de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> para obter o ponto de extremidade de descoberta para usar.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint GetDiscoveryEndpoint() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetDiscoveryEndpoint () As DiscoveryEndpoint

Docs.summary: Obtém o ponto de extremidade de descoberta.
Docs.returns: O ponto de extremidade de descoberta.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> chamado pela classe de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider.GetDiscoveryEndpoint%2A> método na <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> instância passada pelo usuário para obter o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> para descobrir os serviços. <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> também chama <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider.GetDiscoveryEndpoint%2A> método sempre que ele deve clone a mesmo.
